title: Aimai Na Wolf
alternative_title: Aimaina Wolf; Ambiguous Wolf;Chú sói mờ ám;Kind of a Wolf;Wolfsgrau und geheimnisvoll (German);あいまいなウルフ;어설픈 늑대
status: Aimaina Wolf; Ambiguous Wolf;Chú sói mờ ám;Kind of a Wolf;Wolfsgrau und geheimnisvoll (German);あいまいなウルフ;어설픈 늑대
description:
Description :
        Shiroki, a graduate student, was frustrated by his noisy neighbor Hayato every day and tried not to get involved.  However, Shiroki's domestic cat enters the veranda of Hayato's room, and he has no choice but to visit Hayato's room.  Then, he found Hayato with wolf's ears and tail! Shiroki was told by Hayato who was blushing and estrus.The popular "Yakimochi wa Kitsuneiro" spin-off, a cool handsome graduate student x a lonely boy with a wolf, throbbing ☆ neighbor life!
